issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When running euform-describe-stack-resources there is no value displayed for resource_status_reason.  This is a very useful tool when the status is CREATE_FAILED.

comments.body:
[~tony]/[~gholms]:

Verified this has been fixed.  Version of euca2ools:
{code}
# euca-version
euca2ools 3.2.0-pre1-55-g61d2930 (Apollo)
{code}

*Steps*

# Clone master branch of euca2ools from Github
# Set up virtualenv environment
# Built and installed euca2ools from master branch
# Created a cloudformation stack (successful deployment):
{code}
# euform-create-stack --template-file ../cfn-ubuntu-docker.json --parameter "UbuntuImageId=emi-9285d481;UserKeyPair=admin-hspencer-group1" DockerStack --region admin-hspencer@group1
arn:aws:cloudformation::891654978359:stack/DockerStack/660de759-6bda-4a51-8ad0-795d5ebbb9aa
{code}
# Described stack resources
{code}
# euform-describe-stack-resources -n DockerStack --region admin-hspencer@group1 --debug

# Deployed cloudformation stack (unsuccessful deployment):
{code}
# euform-create-stack --template-file cfn-ubuntu-docker.json --parameter "UbuntuImageId=emi-9285d481;UserKeyPair=admin-hspencer-group1" DockerStackV2 --region admin-hspencer@group1
arn:aws:cloudformation::891654978359:stack/DockerStackV2/252499a8-5b61-4cc9-b32f-3ad0db96f5b6
